title: Pcubed Rugby League Varsity Match 2016
desc: The Pcubed Rugby League Varsity Match 2016 Kick-Off: 3.00pm Hospitality from 1pm (bars open at noon) Matchday Tickets Matchday tickets are available in advance for ?13 or can be purchased on the day for ?16. A Matchday special ticket including a ticket to the game, an official matchday programm, a meal, and two free drinks is available for ?25. Tickets for students from Oxford and Cambridge include the cost of coach travel to the game. ?Contact the club representative in your college to purchase. Hospitality Tickets A formal four-course meal will be held in the Prince Consort Room of the HAC. ?The bar will open from noon with food and? entertainment starting at 1pm.
